What is a Ministry Supporter?

A Ministry Supporter is someone who would like to help Christ for Life by dedicating a portion of their time, treasure or talent to further the mission and vision God has entrusted to us as we minister in the larger motorcycle community.

Time

Your presence is needed at bike blessings, services, open houses, and Bible studies at the CFL clubhouse. Most importantly, we value your dedicated prayer for our members and families.

Treasure

Direct donations, purchasing gear, and gifts in kind are essential to sustain our ministry. As a nonprofit, your gifts may be tax deductible and are leveraged for outreach to the biker community.

Talent

Musicians, mechanics, bakers, and bankers—all have a place at the table. Whether technical or creative, we welcome your flair in this season of ministry.

Requirements

While there are no minimum expectations for sharing time and talent, the suggested donation starts at $60 for the first year and $30 annually thereafter.

*You will receive an additional support rocker for each year of support.

Support Patches

The CFL support patches are to be respected and displayed properly. They are to be sewn and proudly displayed on the lower left side of a vest or jacket.

⚠️ NOT to be worn on the back as a center patch at any time.

Supporter Benefits

  • Official Support Certificate
  • 5-inch Ministry Supporter Patch
  • Annual Rocker
  • Supporter T-shirt
  • Key-Chain & Magnet
  • Decal & Annual Calendar
  • Name on Clubhouse Wall Plaque

Supporter Guidelines

By wearing the CFL support patch, you are indirectly representing CFL and Jesus Christ our Lord.

Remember that you are a Ministry Supporter and not a Member of CFL.

Refer specific questions regarding the organization to a CFL Member.
